publications.name: Demonstrating a Control Framework for Physical Human-Robot Interaction Toward Industrial Applications
publications.publisher: Proceedings of Robotics: Science and Systems (RSS) 2025
publications.authors: Bastien Muraccioli, Celerier Mathieu, Benallegue Mehdi, Venture Gentiane
publications.summary: This paper presents a robust control framework for safe, dynamic physical human-robot interaction (pHRI) aimed at industrial applications. It integrates compliance control strategies and a second-order QP formulation to manage safety and task priorities.

publications.name: Scalable, Training-Free Visual Language Robotics: a modular multi-model framework for consumer-grade GPUs
publications.publisher: 2025 IEEE/SICE International Symposium on System Integration (SII)
publications.authors: Marie Samson, Bastien Muraccioli, Fumio Kanehiro
publications.summary: The SVLR framework introduces a scalable, training-free system for vision-language-based robotic control using lightweight, open-source AI models. It interprets language commands and visual input to execute robotic actions without retraining, offering broad adaptability and low resource requirements.

publications.name: Can robots be good public speakers?
publications.publisher: Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Conference on Tangible, Embedded, and Embodied Interaction
publications.authors: Gentiane Venture, Bastien Muraccioli, Marie-Luce Bourguet, Jacqueline Urakami
publications.summary: This paper investigates whether robots can be effective public speakers and what design considerations are critical. Using the Anki Vector robot, the authors implemented a system that translates human gestures and expressions into robot behavior, with plans to compare it to an anthropomorphic alternative.
